showerReviews.reviewText: Very nice little truck stop, clean showers and hot. No toilet in the shower area which is a innocence, however the clean ,refreshing shower makes up for it. Nice staff,friendly, polite people. All in all you can eat subway or other food and …

After a hot day of unloading FD the shower was heaven, great water pressure. I gave them four starts because there is no toilet in the shower room, it was cold when I went into the room, and though it was clean could use an update.  Don't …
Nice people good food selection.. shower's subway... good sized parking lot... What else do you need.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice shower, has Chester's Chicken, and a wide verity of other things. Good people behind the counter and easy going. Thanks guys.
Cheap HOT shower. The staff is super nice and very attentive. IMO this is how a truck stop should be.

showerReviews.reviewText: … . All in all days work! But if you come here after one of those days 2 hours before they close asking to purchase a shower, expect to be told no. Apparently, they use the shower rooms as restrooms while they clean the actual restrooms. The …

I was pretty surprised with this place. Nice and clean.  Lots of parking for trucks. Good food and the cheapest shower if you are not fueling (75 gallons  minimum).
Will stop again.

Clean restrooms
Shower
Restaurant
Big parking lot
Free parking

Honest people. Left my watch in the shower. Could have easily kept it and said they didn't find it. They had it at the counter for me when I came back. Good people are still out there.

Thanks from
One happy vet..
Cashier refused to let me get a shower. His excuse was because they close soon, and tgey sold too many showers today. Its only 8pm, they close at 10pm.
Went there to get a shower and a couple of items.....got turned down for wanting a shower at 8pm.....well I'm never coming back to this place.....it used to be one of my favorite stops

showerReviews.reviewText: This place has plenty of showers but they are so gross! My shower had hair in the sink, lots of dark colored gunk on tiles, tp in the toilet and it was obvious nothing is cleaned between showers just restocked with towels. Showers have bad …
… Same old Petro travel store you see anywhere, and showers that are outdated, but live able. …

I enjoyed the shower. The Hot water remained hot for which I am grateful for given other truck stops. I was disappointed by the conditions of the shower. Cracked ceiling, and tiles. I imagine some sort of renovation is need asap.

They didn't have food at 9 a.m. and this is what the platinum shower looks like. Kind of curious what regular shower it looks like. I thought petro and ta had H"ospital level" cleanliness. If covid-19 was a shower room that's what it would …

Big parking lot, fuel desk guy was nice. Shower are outdated , vents doesn't work so it feels like you are having a steam room, everything is wet, walls and floor. Also those little stairs hallway going to Petro tells you a lot how this …

Paid $17 for a shower, got in bathroom and it was just disgusting, wasn’t clean at all and from the looks of it hasn’t been for a while, and there was no running water! The person that was cleaning bathrooms obviously wasn’t cleaning them, …

I usually like parking here, but I don't think I'll be taking a shower here anymore.
The counter/sink was not cleaned, and they clearly didn't clean the shower since the used soap bar is still in there.

Would give the showers 0 stars if that was a possibility. Not the worst shower but in the top 5 considering I've been on the road since 91 that's an accomplishment.  They were semi clean but this place definitely needs an upgrade tiles …
*I am a car driver and needed a place to shower, eat and rest over night, this place delivered!* …
Seventeen bucks for a shower and you have to wait until the they them upstairs is in the mood to clean one, ask it how long and it gets very entitled and bitchy

locations.title: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop
locations.content: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A …

… has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our …

… entertainment. There’s a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn’t get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There’s also …

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. …

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that …

… of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized …

World’s biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station …

This place is huge. There’s a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There’s also tesla …
… You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. …

… and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be

showerReviews.reviewText: … at great prices. Friendly and helpful staff. You have both diesel and gasoline with lots of snacks if you're on the run. Large parking  area if you're staying for a while. A  clean shower is waiting for you if you want to wash you're frame.

One older lady always tells my fiance and I we leave a mess when dinner in the shower We don't leave any towels or wash clothes on the floor We always put our things in the hamper!! Charging for two shower when we use it at the same time …
Very nice place. Shower is great at the end of a long day
Good food, nice and clean shower. Perfect stop
